html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-07122024-06-17DFO
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the British Columbia Sport Fishing Regulations, 1996
PrecisRegulations Amending the BRITISH COLUMBIA SPORT FISHING REGULATIONS, 1996 in order to (1) prohibit the possession of female Dungeness, female red rock and female king crabs; (2) prohibit the use of barbed hooks in the tidal portion of the Fraser River; (3) require the use of rot cords in all recreational traps; (4) require the use of sinking or weighted buoy lines for recreational traps used for fishing; and (5) require operators' telephone numbers on recreational trap buoys.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0134 Publication Date: 2024-07-03
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the BRITISH COLUMBIA SPORT FISHING REGULATIONS, 1996 in order to (1) prohibit the possession of female Dungeness, female red rock and female king crabs; (2) prohibit the use of barbed hooks in the tidal portion of the Fraser River; (3) require the use of rot cords in all recreational traps; (4) require the use of sinking or weighted buoy lines for recreational traps used for fishing; and (5) require operators' telephone numbers on recreational trap buoys.
